title: ﻿क्या एक रिक्शाचालक का बेटा इकराम खान आईएएस अफसर बना ?
author: www.factcrescendo.com
vclaim: Correction- The boys name is Wali Ullah who graduated as an accountant from Accountancy & Information Systems at University of Dhaka and is son of a farmer. Nevertheless, a truly beautiful gesture and photograph !
